hotkeys_section.message:
Hotkeys

  • F3 or Ctrl+F — Search in playlist. To control the search process use the following hotkeys:
    • F3 or ⇩ (Down) — Go to the next found song
    • ⇧ (Up) — Go to the previous found song
  • Home — Go to the top of the playlist
  • End — Go to the bottom of the playlist
  • PageUp — Scroll playlist up for an one page
  • PageDown — Scroll playlist down for an one page
  • ⇧ (Up) — Scroll up the playlist
  • ⇩ (Down) — Scroll down the playlist
